Chulita Vinyl Club.name: Chulita Vinyl Club
Chulita Vinyl Club.description: Chulita Vinyl Club is made up of women, gender-non-conforming, non-binary, LGBTQ+ and self-identifying people of color that utilize music and vinyl as a form of resistance against the erasure of culture.

Sally Limón.description: Oakland’s own bearded bilingual baby drag thing
